revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{uder|en|grc|ξύλον||wood}} + {{m|grc|γλυφή||carving}} ===Noun=== {{en-noun|-}} # The art of carving in wood. #: '''''Xyloglyphy''' is a form of sculpture, whereas [[xylography]] is engraving in wood.'' # Work produced by this means. #: ''The artist's most popular '''xyloglyphy''' was his "Laughing Buddha" series of carvings.'' #: ''The company produced household '''xyloglyphy''', including shrines and other kinds of carvings in Chinese traditional style.''
